full_summary:
=================

### Title
#### HVAC System Maintenance and Service for the Embassy of Canada to Vienna in Austria

### Reference Information

* **Tender Reference Number:** cb-472-53121349
* **Solicitation Number:** 24-252785
* **Publication Date:** 2024-02-21
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2024-03-18T14:00:00

### Tender Description

The government requires a contractor to provide comprehensive HVAC system maintenance and service for the Embassy of Canada in Vienna, Austria.

### Tender Requirements

* 2 annual inspections in January and July to assess the condition of the HVAC system
* 2 annual maintenance sessions in April and October to perform necessary repairs and maintenance tasks
* Remote daily monitoring of the HVAC system to identify and address any issues promptly

### Evaluation Criteria

The contractor will be evaluated based on their technical merit and price. A combined rating of the two criteria will be used to determine the successful bidder.

### Trade Agreements

This tender is available to Canadian and international companies under the following trade agreements:
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Contact Information

For further information, please contact:
* Meagan Leclair
* Address: None, Phone: (343) 598-9721, Email: [realproperty-contracts@international.gc.ca](mailto:realproperty-contracts@international.gc.ca)

### Attachments

Tender documents and specifications can be found in the following links:
* English: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/32479/24-252785---rfp-en.pdf
* French: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/32479/24-252785---rfp-fr.pdf
